name: Hidden Object Crosswords
summary: Try a whole new twist to Hidden Object games when you search for clues to complete Crossword puzzles. Simply click on the crossword puzzle to get a riddle hint, then try to figure out the item. How fast can you complete the puzzle to earn rewarding trophies? Search for clues and find the answers in more than 50 challenging levels. Fill in the blank to pop culture references, figure out proverbs, and decipher clever riddles. If you get stuck, click on the firefly for a letter hint, or click on the Hint button to reveal the item. With a relaxing pace, a soothing soundtrack, and wonderful riddles to solve, this unique game combination will surely keep you engaged.
